items.name: button
items.title: Button
items.description: Animated button component with press feedback, loading states, and icon support.

items.name: alert-dialog
items.title: Alert Dialog
items.description: Animated modal dialog with morphing animations, focus trap, and controlled/uncontrolled state.

items.name: popover
items.title: Popover
items.description: Animated popover component with morphing transitions, focus trap, and click-outside handling.

items.name: dropdown-menu
items.title: Dropdown Menu
items.description: Animated dropdown menu with smooth spring animations and staggered item reveals.

items.name: motion-provider
items.title: Motion Provider
items.description: Global animation configuration provider with reduced motion and low-power device detection.

items.name: animations
items.title: Animations
items.description: Motion system with spring presets, transitions, and variant factories.

items.name: tokens
items.title: Design Tokens
items.description: Centralized design tokens for colors, spacing, typography, shadows, and more.

items.name: icons
items.title: Animated Icons
items.description: Animated icon components including loading spinners, morphing icons, and close buttons.

items.name: use-click-outside
items.title: useClickOutside
items.description: Hook to detect clicks outside a referenced element.

items.name: use-stable-id
items.title: useStableId
items.description: SSR-safe hook for generating stable unique IDs for accessibility attributes.

items.name: use-controllable-state
items.title: useControllableState
items.description: Hook for handling controlled/uncontrolled state pattern in components.

items.name: use-merged-refs
items.title: useMergedRefs
items.description: Hook to merge multiple refs into a single callback ref.

items.name: avatar
items.title: Avatar
items.description: Composable avatar component with sizes, status indicators, and group stacking support.

items.name: pull-down
items.title: Pull Down Menu
items.description: A pull down menu with morphing animations. The trigger morphs into the menu container with spring physics.

items.name: input
items.title: Input
items.description: A styled input component with focus states, validation support, and file input styling.

items.name: scroll-area
items.title: Scroll Area
items.description: A scrollable area with custom scrollbars built on Radix UI ScrollArea.

items.name: separator
items.title: Separator
items.description: A visual separator for dividing content, supporting horizontal and vertical orientations.

items.name: sheet
items.title: Sheet
items.description: A slide-out panel component with drag-to-dismiss, multiple sides, and smooth animations.

items.name: skeleton
items.title: Skeleton
items.description: A loading placeholder component with pulse animation for content loading states.

items.name: slider
items.title: Slider
items.description: A range slider component with single or multiple thumbs, built on Radix UI Slider.

items.name: tooltip
items.title: Tooltip
items.description: A tooltip component with smooth animations and configurable positioning.

items.name: sidebar
items.title: Sidebar
items.description: A responsive sidebar component with collapsible states, mobile sheet mode, and keyboard shortcuts.

items.name: use-mobile
items.title: useMobile
items.description: Hook to detect mobile viewport based on media query.
